titleStmt.title: A Third collection of new songs, never printed before the words by Mr. D'urfey ; set to music by the best masters in that science, viz. Dr. John Blow, Mr. Henry Purcell, Senior Baptist, Mr. Courtiville, Mr. William Turner, Mr. Thomas Farmer, Mr. John Lenton, Mr. Samuel Ackeroyd ; with thorow-basses for the theorbo, and bass-viol.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.P. for Joseph Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Twelve songs, by Ackroyde, Blow, Courteville, Draghi, Farmer, Lenton, Purcell, Turner, and anonymous.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
